message.content:
I need to find the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see the line item "Depreciation" with a value of 45749.76 as of 2024-01-28.

The task is asking for the specific value associated with accumulated depreciation. In an income statement, the depreciation expense for the period is shown, which is 45749.76 in this case.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45749.76'} }
```
